metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9797 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description: In BlueZ 5.42, a buffer over-read was observed in "l2cap_dump" function in "tools/parser/l2cap.c" source file. This issue can be triggered by processing a corrupted dump file and will result in hcidump crash.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2020-02-07, appears unfixed crash in hcidump command line tool only

criterions.comment: bluez: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
